variable.name: WTCUR_4
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: WTMAX_4
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN_4
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: WALKSWK_4
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_4
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_4
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_4
variable.comment: STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast). For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_4
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q5.1 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_4
variable.comment: MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_4
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q5.3 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_4
variable.comment: MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_4
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q5.5 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: EXPOSURE_4
variable.comment: After you have been out in the sun for 45-60 minutes for the first time during summer, which describes the reaction of your unprotected skin in exposed areas?
variable.value: Burns, then tans a minimal amount

variable.name: SMSNCHLD_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/summer/During childhood (5-12 years old)

variable.name: SMSNTEEN_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/summer/During your teens

variable.name: SMSNTHRT_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/summer/During your thirties

variable.name: SMSNNOW_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/summer/This year

variable.name: OTSNCHLD_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/other seasons/During childhood (5-12 years old)

variable.name: OTSNTEEN_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/other seasons/During your teens

variable.name: OTSNTHRT_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/other seasons/During your thirties

variable.name: OTSNNOW_4
variable.comment: Time outdoors/other seasons/This year

variable.name: DGLSCHLD_4
variable.comment: Wear dark glasses/During childhood (5-12 years old)

variable.name: DGLSTEEN_4
variable.comment: Wear dark glasses/During your teens

variable.name: DGLSTHRT_4
variable.comment: Wear dark glasses/During your thirties

variable.name: DGLSNOW_4
variable.comment: Wear dark glasses/This year

variable.name: WRHTCHLD_4
variable.comment: Wear hat outdoors/During childhood (5-12 years old)

variable.name: WRHTTEEN_4
variable.comment: Wear hat outdoors/During your teens

variable.name: WRHTTHRT_4
variable.comment: Wear hat outdoors/During your thirties

variable.name: WRHTNOW_4
variable.comment: Wear hat outdoors/This year

variable.name: SNSCRN_4
variable.comment: During the past year, when you were outside for more than 10 minutes, did you usually use a sunscreen?

variable.name: SPF_4
variable.comment: What whas the SPF (Sun Protection Factor) you usually used? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q10 'Usually use sunscreen outside'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_4
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_4
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q11 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: NUTSWTNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/Diet soda or fruit drink with Nutrasweet (like Diet Coke, Diet Pepsi, Crystal Light)

variable.name: SACHARNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/Diet soda or fruit drink with saccharine

variable.name: DRKEQLNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/A drink sweetened with Equal

variable.name: DRKSLWNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/A drink sweetened with Sweet N Low

variable.name: DESEQLNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/A dessert made with Equal

variable.name: DESSLWNW_4
variable.comment: Past year/A dessert made with Sweet N Low

variable.name: OESTRANW_4
variable.comment: Past year/A food with the fat substitute Olestra

variable.name: NUTSWT10_4
variable.comment: Ten years ago/Diet soda or fruit drink with Nutrasweet (like Diet Coke, Diet Pepsi, Crystal Light)

variable.name: SACHAR10_4
variable.comment: Ten years ago/Diet soda or fruit drink with saccharine

variable.name: DRKEQL10_4
variable.comment: Ten years ago/A drink sweetened with Equal

variable.name: DRKSLW10_4
variable.description: Sweet N Low drink/10 years ago
variable.comment: Ten years ago/A drink sweetened with Sweet N Low

variable.name: DESEQL10_4
variable.comment: Ten years ago/A dessert made with Equal

variable.name: DESSLW10_4
variable.description: Sweet N Low dessert/10 years ago
variable.comment: Ten years ago/A dessert made with Sweet N Low

variable.name: SACHAR20_4
variable.comment: Twenty years ago/Diet soda with saccharine (like Diet Coke, Diet Pepsi)

variable.name: DRKSLW20_4
variable.description: Sweet N Low drink/20 years ago
variable.comment: Twenty years ago/A drink sweetened with Sweet N Low

variable.name: DESSLW20_4
variable.description: Sweet N Low dessert/20 years ago
variable.comment: Twenty years ago/A dessert made with Sweet N Low

variable.name: NATHOR_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any natural hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream.

variable.name: YAMCRM_4
variable.comment: Wild yam or progesterone creams Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: YAMPLS_4
variable.comment: Wild yam pills Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGSUP_4
variable.comment: Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: DHEAPL_4
variable.comment: DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone pills) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYPLS_4
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen pills (soy or flax) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYCRM_4
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYFDS_4
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen containing foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTOTHR_4
variable.comment: Other Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTDNTK_4
variable.comment: Don't know Sub-question of F144 V1 Q15 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: HRPST1YR_4
variable.description: Used female hormones in past year
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE) that were prescribed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPL_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill or package (for example, Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q17 'Combined estr/progest pills'.

variable.name: ETPL_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ETDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q18 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q18 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: EPL_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use ESTROGEN PILLS which were prescribed by a doctor (for example, Premarin, Estrace, Ogen)? (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen progestin or the combined pill of estrogen and testosterone.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use ESTROGEN PILLS? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q19 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDAYS_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, when you were using ESTROGEN pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q19 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of ESTROGEN pills did you use the longest? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q19 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDOSE_4
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q19 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: ESHT_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you take shots containing the hormone ESTROGEN? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you take the shots? (Count each shot as one month.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q20 'Took estrogen shots'.

variable.name: ECRM_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use a vaginal cream or suppository containing ESTROGEN which was prescribed by a doctor? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use the vaginal cream or suppository? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q21 'Used estrogen vaginally'.

variable.name: EPCH_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you use a SKIN PATCH containing the hormone ESTROGEN with or without PROGESTOERONE (for example, Estraderm, Climara, Vivelle)? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
On forms 146-148 this variable reflects non-combination estrogen use only.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q22 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHTYPE_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of patch did you use the longest? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q22 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHDOSE_4
variable.comment:
What does of ESTROGEN was in the skin patch you usually used? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q22 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHCHNG_4
variable.comment:
What was the average number of times each week that you changed your skin patch? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q22 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: PPL_4
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use the female hormone PILL called PROGESTERONE or progestin (for example, Provera, Cycrin, Aman, Megace)? (Do not included the combined pill of estrogen and progestin.) Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use PROGESTERONE or progestin pills? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q23 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, when you were using PROGESTERONE or progestin pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q23 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_4
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of PROGESTERONE or progestin pills did you use the longest? Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q23 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDOSE_4
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose). Sub-question of F144 V1 Q16 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F144 V1 Q23 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: CATARACT_4
variable.comment: Cataracts(s)

variable.name: MACDEGNR_4
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: ASTHMA_4
variable.comment: Asthma

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_4
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_4
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_4
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: ATRIALFB_4
variable.comment: Atrial fibrillation

variable.name: KIDNEYST_4
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_4
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: STOMULCR_4
variable.comment: Stomach or duodenal ulcer

variable.name: DIVERTIC_4
variable.comment: Diverticulitis

variable.name: PANCREAT_4
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_4
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: OVRTHY_4
variable.comment: Overactive thyroid

variable.name: UNDTHY_4
variable.comment: Underactive thyroid

variable.name: ALZHEIM_4
variable.comment: Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: MS_4
variable.comment: Multiple sclerosis

variable.name: PARKINS_4
variable.comment: Parkinson's disease

variable.name: ALS_4
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: MARITAL_4
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.)

variable.name: TEPIWK_4
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 5.1, 5.3, and 5.5. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT_4
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5 and 5.6. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK_4
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4.2, 5.1, and 5.3. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI_4
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3 and 5.4. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI_4
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categ)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, and 5.4. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, question 5.1. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK_4
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, and 5.6. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK_4
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.2, 5.1, and 5.3. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK_4
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 5.1 and 5.2. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK_4
variable.description: Total energy expend from recreational phys. activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, and 5.6. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP_4
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP_4
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 5.1 and 5.2. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 5.3 and 5.4. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144, questions 5.5 and 5.6. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: EST_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144 questions 16, 17, 18, 19 and 22.

variable.name: PRG_4
variable.comment: Computed from Form 144 questions 16, 17, 22, 22.2 and 23.

variable.name: HRT_4
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Progesterone use last year' and 'Estrogen use last year'.
